MAN.TITLE: TK_SetVar

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string character Contains the name of the tcl/tk variable to set.
: string character Contains the value to set up in the tcl/tk variable

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine allows to set a variable within the tcl/tk interpreter. When tcl/tk support is enabled in scilab, this routine can be used to set up the value of a tcl/tk variable. This can be useful to change some value in the tcl/tk without having to build a tcl/tk instruction (and use TK_EvalStr).
